titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Jon Krampner Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

note.p: The original provenance of these papers is kept intact. The order closely reflects the chapter outline of Mr. Krampner’s biography of Fred Coe. Numbers in parenthesis show the pagination and number of additional pages in each folder.

did.unittitle: Delbert and Ann Mann (1-18 plus 3 pages)
UCLA Film and Television Archive [and others] (17 pages)
New York Times Articles (2 pages printed from Microfilm)
Writers’, Directors’ Firsts [Also: Reading Notes of Philcos] ( 1-33)
(c-31)- Fred Coe Specific [Post-Hoc Variety Clips] (9 pages)
J. P. Miller (1-2 and a-c plus 1 page)
Bill Nichols (1-27 plus 1 page and booklet on St. Maarten)
Pat Weaver [Sylvester L. Weaver, Jr.] (1-6 plus 1 page)
ULS Listings (Union List of Serials) (2 Pages)
The Great White Way (1-5 plus 3 pages)
Birth of a Medium (1-51 plus 2 pages)
Empty- Alice Coe (Transferred to Alice book)
Empty- Adna Karns (Transferred to Ch.2 book)
“Television Production Problems”—“Problems in the Studio” by FC (Also: John Royal Introduction) (17 pages)
Post Hoc (Chapter 3 Post-Hoc Outline)(1-3 plus 10 pages)
Fred Coe News (Including First Stable Info. ‘48-’51 FC Articles, Palmetto Doc Letter)(1-18)
Empty- Joyce (Beeler) Coe (plus: Osborner Centric bios) (Moved to “Joyce” book )
D. W. Griffith (Includes “Birth of the Movies” Screening Notes) (1-22)
Post- Hoc (Chapter 4 Post-Hoc Outline) (1-16, 1-27 plus 2 pages)
Variety of Obituaries of Wally Cox (6 pages)
P-54 Articles and Documents (1-39 plus 3 pages)
P-90 Reviews (1-30 plus 6 pages) [Notices of Elaine Man’s Withdrawal from “Journey” J-14, 9a-29e and Ratings for “Bell Tolls I and II” and Competitors J-14, 21a-21b]
S.H.S.W. Period-Relevant Correspondence and Article about Alice (6 pages)
Fred Coe Pix B. O. Grosses (1-2)
A Matter of Position (1-11 plus 1 pages)
A Thousand Clowns (Stage Version) (1-5 plus 2 pages)
Laurie and John @ Old Spaghetti Factory (1-17)
The Final War of Olly Winter (1967) (1-41)
Fred Coe / Joyce Coe Matrimonial File (1-8)
Town Theatre- Articles and Reviews (1-63 plus 1 page)
This Time Next Year (1-8 plus 102 pages)
FC Letters to AC (1-11 plus 2 pages)
Miscellaneous Materials found loose in binders
Video- Remembering Fred Coe: “The Live Television Years”
Video- A Tribute to Fred Coe- Museum of T.V. and Radio Paley Festival Los Angeles 3/2000
Video- T:53188 A Tribute to Fred Coe TRT: 01:33:54 VHS Copy-With Clips Seminar
No Number-A Eleanor Cogbill, Pat Weaver
